title: The Fate and Future of Rod Rosenstein
description:
The future of Rod Rosenstein, the man who oversees Robert Mueller's Russia investigation, is in doubt. After conflicting reports Monday that he was out of a job, he'll now meet with President Trump Thursday to discuss his future. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News Chief Content Officer Marty Schenker about what's at stake for the Mueller investigation if Rosenstein is out of a job.
FOLLOW UP
You can follow Marty at @mschenker
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
